oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion and performance - Barry Mazor on Ralph Peer and the Making of Country Music - 2014-11-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Discussion with author Barry Mazor surrounding the release of his book Ralph Peer and the Making of Popular Roots Music from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 15, 2014. Includes performances by Shawn Camp.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Barry Mazor; Shawn Camp;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Discussion moderated by John Rumble. Includes audio from video and comments from Ralph Peer II. Performances by Shawn Camp with band include; The Storms Are On The Ocean -- Slipping Around -- Take Me Back To Tulsa -- White Lightning -- Not Fade Away
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mazor, Barry; Camp, Shawn; Peer, Ralph Sylvester, 1892-1960; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
